---
category: news
title: "ASIC starts using its protected AWS data lake at scale"
excerpt: "The Australian Securities and Investments Commission has begun using its protected-level certified data lake at scale, underpinning the delivery of more than 130 data projects. Chief data and analytics officer Scott Barber told a Databricks and Public Sector Network event last month that the platform is quickly becoming “core to everything we’re trying to do” with data."
